headline: Microchip Tech (MCHP) Sheds 6.7% as Chip Giant Signals Soft Outlook
summary: We recently published Wall Street’s 10 Worst Performing Stocks. Microchip Technology Incorporated (NASDAQ:MCHP) is one of the worst performers on Wednesday. Microchip Technology declined by 6.66 percent on Wednesday to close at $70.25 apiece after a semiconductor giant signaled weaker demand and a cautious outlook for the industry. Microchip Technology Incorporated (NASDAQ:MCHP) dropped alongside its semiconductor […]

headline: Texas Instruments Q2 Earnings: Solid Quarter, Still Waiting For A Better Entry Point
summary: Texas Instruments posts strong Q2 results with revenue growth & better capital management, but geopolitical risks & high valuation challenge future gains.

headline: STMicro Posts Surprise Loss as Restructuring Costs Pile Up
summary: (Bloomberg) -- STMicroelectronics NV posted a surprise loss in the second quarter due to a $190 million impairment and restructuring charges linked to the chipmaker’s plan to streamline the business.Most Read from BloombergTrump Awards $1.26 Billion Contract to Build Biggest Immigrant Detention Center in USWhy the Federal Reserve’s Building Renovation Costs $2.5 BillionThe High Costs of Trump’s ‘Big Beautiful’ New Car Loan DeductionSalt Lake City Turns Winter Olympic Bid Into Statewide Bond Boom
